Control Name: Creates and Maintains Records of System Storage Activities—Records of system storage activities are created and maintained completely and accurately in a timely manner.

control_attributes.Control: Creates and Maintains Records of System Storage Activities—Records of system storage activities are created and maintained completely and accurately in a timely manner.
control_attributes.SubCategory: PI1.5 The entity implements policies and procedures to store inputs, items in processing, and outputs completely, accurately, and timely in accordance with system specifications to meet the entity’s objectives.
